textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer A collection born from 35 years in the fashion industry, designer Adriano Goldschmied has created the most luxurious denim experience with GOLDSIGN jeans. GOLDSIGN is a distinct line of premium denim that marries technical expertise with directional design and impeccable quality and fit. Redefining denim, worn seams are hand stitched creating a semi-couture feel, and revolutionary hand wash techniques are used to give jeans an aged feeling, as though they have been passed down for generations. See all GOLDSIGN reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
